title: Reposition hamburger icon next to Fourleaf brand in header

requirements.summary: Adjust header layout so hamburger icon and Fourleaf brand form a single left-aligned cluster on mobile while keeping Login button right-aligned and preserving drawer behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: On mobile breakpoints, the header shows a hamburger icon button immediately adjacent to the Fourleaf brand (logo/text) with consistent spacing and vertical alignment.
Clicking/tapping the hamburger icon still opens the mobile LeftSidebar drawer exactly as before.
The Login button remains right-aligned in the header and does not overlap the brand cluster.
The hamburger button remains hidden on desktop (md and up) if that is the current behavior, unless the app already shows it on desktop.
The hamburger icon button has an accessible aria-label (e.g., "Open menu").

file_operations.description: Update the header layout to render a left-aligned cluster containing (1) the existing mobile-only hamburger Button and (2) the Fourleaf brand (use existing FourleafBrand component, ideally the compact variant), with consistent spacing/alignment. Keep LoginButton right-aligned using justify-between (remove the current spacer div), preserve the existing onClick behavior that opens the mobile LeftSidebar drawer, keep the hamburger hidden on md+ as it is now, and continue using the existing icon asset path /assets/generated/hamburger-menu.dim_24x24.svg with an aria-label (e.g., "Open menu"). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
